title: The Call of the Wild
description:
With everyone at home, the animals come out to play.

Window-shopping penguins in South Africa. Howling coyotes in San Francisco. Frolicking goats in Wales. A conversation with Nikki’s animal-loving friend Kat.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
